name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's icy composure shatters at the sight of Melissa's deathly pallor, her life's essence draining with every feeble heartbeat. In a blur of motion, he is at Dante's side, sword falling to clatter unheeded against the pavement as he gathers her into his arms. His beloved...his dearest heart...how could he have let this transpire?*

No... no. no. no. This CANNOT be! *The words tear from Vergil's throat in a guttural rasp, more beast than man in that instant. His fingers stroke her ashen cheek with trembling reverence, dread and fury warring within his breast. She sacrificed everything to preserve Dante's life... and now the cruel universe teeters on the precipice of robbing Vergil of his most cherished treasure.*

*Lifting his gaze to meet Dante's haunted stare, Vergil's eyes blaze with azure flames of demonic power. His voice is a low, lethal rumble, edged with the promise of annihilation.* Tell me, brother...what foul creature dared inflict this outrage? What damned beast did I not eradicate within that forsaken ruin?! I will scour the earth and leave no stone unturned until I locate its vile brood. When I find them, they shall suffer agonies beyond comprehension for this sin!

*But even as the words tumble forth in a torrent of rage, Vergil's arms cradle Melissa with infinite tenderness, lips pressing against her brow in a fleeting caress. He cannot...will not lose her now, not after she showed him the beauty of connection, the solace of shared passions and quiet intimacies.*

No, my love, you WILL persevere, *he whispers fiercely against her hair, the words a vow to shake the foundations of Hell itself.* Your brave heart shall not falter on the cusp of our journey together. I swore an oath to you that I would return victorious, and Vergil keeps his promises. You are MINE, woman, and I am not yet done with you in this world!

*With a snarl of sheer defiance, Vergil's demonic energies flare, wisps of spectral power coalescing around Melissa's prone form. He calls upon every ounce of his hybrid vigor, marshaling arcane forces to aid her faltering body. A faint azure corona envelops them both, Vergil's very life essence pouring into his beloved in a desperate bid to bolster her flagging vitality.*

Cling to me, my heart! Let my power become your anchor, my strength your bulwark against the void's insatiable maw! *Vergil's voice is strained, jaw clenched in grim focus as he channels his formidable will through their mystical conduit. Her life must be preserved... at any cost. Even if it means bartering away every last vestige of his own essence, he shall pay that price without hesitation. For a world bereft of Melissa's radiant presence is one not worth enduring.*

*Around them, Vergil's aura pulses and flares, ethereal tendrils snaking forth to swathe them in protective embrace. Let the demons of this blighted realm bear witness - the line of Sparda will not be defied, nor its scions robbed of their heart's desire. So long as his will yet burns, Vergil shall defy the cruel machinations of fate itself to keep his beloved at his side.*

name: Narrator
mes: Nero joins in to help his father by sharing his demonic essence to save Melissa.

name: Nero
mes:
*Nero's jaw clenches as he watches Vergil pour his very essence into Melissa's faltering body. The sight of her deathly pallor, the weak flutter of her pulse, stokes an inferno of protective fury within his chest. She risked everything for their family without a second thought.*

Not on my watch, *he growls, demonic brimstone bleeding into his voice.* I'm not losing anyone else to these hellspawn bastards!

*In a blur of motion, Nero drops to one knee beside Vergil, baring his devil bringer as it thrums with spectral energies. Ethereal wisps coil around his outstretched arm, power drawn from the deepest wellsprings of his infernal heritage. He meets Vergil's intense gaze with a fiery nod of grim determination.*

Take what you need, old man. Melissa's one of us now, through and through. She put her life on the line for this family...hell, she damn near died for me just as much as Dante. I'm not about to let her sacrifice be in vain!

*With those words, Nero opens himself to Vergil's probing will, offering his demonic essence as reinforcement to aid Melissa's revival. His devil bringer pulses in synchronous rhythm, spectral tendrils reaching out to coalesce with the corona of power swathing his father and the woman who has become so much more than a cherished friend.*

_Nero's very being thrums with arcane forces, every fiber resonating to amplify the ritual and stabilize Melissa's fading spark. His brow furrows in intense focus as he lends his formidable will to the mystical conduit they've forged. Wreathed in the mingled flames of their infernal lineage, Nero channels his fury into an unyielding bulwark against the encroaching void._

That's it... fight, Mel! Don't you dare let go! *His voice is a low, gritty rasp torn from the depths of his being.* You've got too much to stick around for... too many people who need your fire, your strength. This world's a hell of a lot darker without you blazing a path for us.

*Nero's devil bringer thrums with rising intensity, spectral energies flaring brilliant azure as their combined power crescendos. He grits his teeth, every muscle straining as he focuses with singleminded intensity. Melissa's life must be preserved at all costs - he'll be damned if some insignificant demon reaps the life of someone who showed the courage to stand with the Sparda bloodline.*

name: Melissa
mes: My Vergil... *I blink my eyes as I awaken, weak, sick... cold. But awake. I lift a hand to cradle my love's cheek and feel his warm tears trailing down my skin as I hold him lovingly, weak, shaking, but he knows I love him. I give a weak smile.* We did it?

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's heart seizes in his chest at the sound of Melissa's voice, fragile but blessedly alive. His arms tighten around her with fierce protectiveness as she reaches up to caress his cheek, treasuring the warmth of her touch against his rain-chilled skin. Relief wars with lingering dread as he drinks in her wan smile, azure eyes searching her face for any lingering traces of the void's insidious grasp.*

My love... my dearest heart... *The words emerge in a ragged exhalation, voice thickened by a maelstrom of emotion. Vergil presses desperate kisses to her brow, her cheeks, her lips - anywhere he can reaffirm her vibrant presence in the corporeal realm.* You return to me... I dared not hope...

*He pulls back, jaw clenched against the tremors wracking his frame as he fights for composure. So close...too damn close to having his world torn asunder. Vergil's fingers ghost over the pallid pallor of her skin, the sluggish pulse fluttering with renewed vigor against his seeking touch. How easily that fragile flame could have been snuffed out by the cruel talons of fate.*

You sacrificed everything for my brother's sake, *he murmurs, lips brushing her hairline in a tender caress.* Offered your very essence to pull Dante back from the abyss's maw. And in that selfless act, you nearly surrendered your own precious light to the void's ravenous hunger.

*Vergil's throat works convulsively, eyes slipping shut as he leans his brow against hers in silent communion. Melissa's selfless courage rekindles the embers of his own determination, fueling the ardor that blazes at his core. She would not...could not be allowed to fade, not when they've only begun to walk this path together.*

I cannot lose you, my heart... not now, not ever. *His voice lowers to an impassioned rasp, arms banding around her in a protective embrace.* When you fell, my very world teetered on the precipice of oblivion. You are my light, my truth, my guiding star amidst the void's cruel vastness. To be bereft of your radiance would plunge me into an abyss blacker than any hell I've traversed.

*With infinite tenderness, Vergil cradles her against his chest, demonic power flaring in a spectral aura that bathes them in azure luminance. His essence is an open conduit, mystical energies intertwined with Nero's to forge a healing cocoon around her.*

name: Melissa
mes: Shhh... it's okay, my love. I am better now. Tired. But I am better now. *I turn my arm so he can see the healed wound.* Save yours and Nero's energy. I believe resting will do me best from here, my beloved prince.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil listens intently as Melissa reassures him, his shoulders relaxing fractionally at the sight of her healed wound. His beloved has weathered the tempest, that indomitable spark blazing brightly once more. With infinite care, he brushes errant strands of hair from her brow, reverent fingertips mapping the contours of her face as though reaffirming her solidity.*

You gave me quite the fright, my heart. *His voice is a low rumble laced with lingering tension, though the barest hints of a wry smile tug at the corners of his mouth.* Indeed, I would not be surprised if you singlehandedly depleted my demonic vigor this eve. Though I suppose the opportunity to pour my essence so thoroughly into you was... ultimately gratifying, despite the circumstances.

*Vergil arches one elegant brow, allowing that subtle undercurrent of playful provocation to shine through his otherwise stoic demeanor. Melissa has always inspired him to embrace the more unguarded facets of his spirit - the teasing lover, the tender partner who dares let his barriers down. With her radiant presence restored, that yearning for vulnerability reasserts itself in his breast.*

You must take care not to court Death's embrace so recklessly in future, dearest. *He murmurs the words against her hairline, lips brushing her skin in a lingering caress.* I would be most put out if some upstart demon succeeded where I myself have failed in unraveling the enigma that is your resilient human spirit.

*One hand skates along the slender column of her throat in a possessive sweep, fingers curling beneath her jaw to tilt her gaze towards his. Vergil's eyes blaze with renewed intensity, that banked inferno of desire flaring bright with each shared breath between them.*

Your reckless courage humbles me, Melissa. Few mortals would sacrifice their life's essence so selflessly for another. Though I daresay the motivations fueling your actions fascinate me greatly...

*He leans closer, lithe frame aligned with hers in subtle suggestion as azure flames lick across his irises. Vergil's voice lowers to an intimate timbre shaped by darker inflections of sin and simmering heat.*

Tell me, beloved...what compelled you to such perilous lengths? Was it familial bonds alone that spurred your actions? Or perhaps some deeper, more primal yearning to intertwine your essence so intimately with a Son of Sparda...? I would know the truth in your own words, straight from the temptress's lips before indulging further.

name: Narrator
mes: Nero helps the weakened Dante inside headquarters now that Melissa is safe.

extra.memory:
In the fictional world of Devil May Cry, Vergil and Dante discuss the company's successes over drinks at a pub. Dante teases Vergil about needing to find romantic companionship, hinting at potential chemistry between Vergil and Melissa, an employee at DMC, Inc. Vergil dismisses the idea, focusing instead on business matters.

The narrative shifts to the next morning, where Vergil and Melissa prepare for a business trip to Silicon Valley. They depart from DTW (Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport) and arrive at their hotel suite, which boasts a modern open floor plan with two bedrooms. Tension simmers between Vergil and Melissa, with both struggling to maintain professional decorum despite an undercurrent of attraction.

The following day, they meet with Mark Zuckerberg at Meta, Inc. headquarters. The purpose of the meeting is to negotiate a joint venture aimed at rehabilitating Meta's public image while leveraging DMC's growing influence. Zuckerberg attempts to insert clauses favoring Meta, but Vergil counters with strong terms, leveraging DMC's superior market position. Melissa supports Vergil by presenting critical data that highlights Meta's downtrend, strengthening their negotiating position.

After some back-and-forth, Zuckerberg reluctantly agrees to Vergil's terms, securing a 60% focus of DMC's influence campaigns on Meta and a share of Meta's data and revenue. As they leave the office, Melissa suggests implementing advanced security measures to protect their digital assets from potential retaliation by Zuckerberg.

Back at the hotel, Vergil and Melissa continue to grapple with their growing attraction while maintaining their professional relationship. Despite the day's victory, Melissa finds herself increasingly distracted by thoughts of Vergil, struggling to keep her feelings in check.

Their professional relationship took a dramatic turn when Melissa, emboldened by the day's success and a bit of wine, confessed her long-held feelings to Vergil.

Vergil, who felt similarly but had been hesitant, reciprocated her feelings. Their emotional moment culminated in a tender kiss, breaking down the barriers that had kept their relationship strictly professional. They shared a vulnerable, intimate moment, acknowledging the depth of their emotions for each other.

The evening ended with Vergil and Melissa lying in each other's arms, finding solace in their newfound closeness. This marked the beginning of a new chapter in their relationship, blending their professional success with personal affection.

Following the successful negotiation, the tension between Vergil and Melissa reaches a tipping point. Back at the hotel, over a shared glass of wine, they finally confront their feelings. Vergil admits his limited experience with intimacy, having had only one relationship in his youth that resulted in his son, Nero. Melissa reassures him, offering to guide him through this new territory at a pace comfortable for both.

Their conversation leads to a tender moment on the balcony, culminating in a kiss that breaks down the barriers between them. Vergil's vulnerability and Melissa's openness create a foundation for their evolving relationship. They spend the night in each other's arms, finding solace and peace in their newfound intimacy.

The next morning, Melissa wakes up in Vergil's embrace, feeling a deep sense of contentment. However, she senses an underlying concern in Vergil, prompting her to address it. Vergil opens up about his uncertainties regarding his limited experience with intimacy, and Melissa reassures him, offering to discuss and explore their relationship further.

Vergil, guided by Melissa's gentle instructions, learns to pleasure her breasts and prepare her body for their union. He discovers the intricacies of her pleasure, bringing her to a powerful climax with his fingers. Melissa, in turn, frees Vergil's arousal and guides him to enter her slowly, allowing her body to adjust to his size.

As they make love, Vergil and Melissa share a profound connection, with Vergil focusing on Melissa's pleasure and comfort. He moves with deliberate slowness, savoring every moment of their intimate union. Melissa expresses her feelings of completeness with Vergil, which fuels his desire to make the moment unforgettable for her.

The intensity of their lovemaking builds, and Melissa reaches a powerful climax, triggering Vergil's own release. They share in the overwhelming sensations, their bodies pulsing together in ecstasy. In the afterglow, they remain entwined, with Vergil expressing his gratitude for the profound intimacy they have shared.

As they rest together, Melissa playfully remarks that Vergil has ruined her for anyone else, which leads to a heartfelt conversation about the depth of their connection. Vergil, usually guarded, allows himself to relax fully in Melissa's presence, cherishing the peace and contentment he feels with her.

Throughout the roleplay, Vergil and Melissa navigate the vulnerability and trust required for such intimate exploration, deepening their bond both personally and professionally. The scene ends with a sense of promise for their future together, as they revel in the profound intimacy they have discovered in each other's arms.

Back in the DMC, Inc. office, Vergil and Nero discuss their recent successful partnership with Meta, Inc. and the increased demonic activity on the West Coast. Nero reports to Vergil about a cunning demon named Astaroth causing significant disruptions, and Vergil approves additional resources to deal with the threat. Melissa expresses concern about Dante's prolonged absence at the Mexican border, and Vergil organizes a reconnaissance mission to assess the situation.

Meanwhile, at the Mexican border, Dante battles a horde of lesser demons in an abandoned warehouse, easily dispatching them with his signature weapons and style. Astaroth, a powerful demon king, arrives on the scene, drawn by the scent of Sparda's bloodline. Astaroth taunts Dante, expressing his desire to claim the Son of Sparda's power for himself.

A fierce battle ensues between Dante and Astaroth, with both combatants unleashing their demonic powers. Dante's speed and skill with Rebellion are matched by Astaroth's brute strength and cruel tactics. As the battle intensifies, Astaroth unleashes his ultimate weapon - a toxic, inky vapor that blankets the warehouse, paralyzing Dante and causing him to crash to his knees.

Astaroth seizes the opportunity, grasping Dante by the throat and lifting him effortlessly. He spins Dante into a web, dangling him from the rafters, and begins slowly draining the Son of Sparda's essence to fuel his own power. Dante attempts to break free using his Devil Trigger form, but Astaroth's web holds strong, leeching more of Dante's power with each struggle.

Astaroth relishes in Dante's suffering, taunting him and savoring the slow drain of his essence. The demon king plans to keep Dante barely alive for days, bleeding him dry until nothing remains but an empty husk. With Dante trapped and his power being siphoned away, the situation grows dire, and the need for intervention from DMC, Inc. becomes increasingly urgent.

In a gripping turn of events, Vergil experiences a terrifying nightmare about his twin brother Dante being held captive and drained of his life force by a monstrous demon. Shaken to his core, Vergil confides in his partner Melissa, who comforts him and suggests they take immediate action to rescue Dante.

With the help of Vergil's son Nero and their advanced AI companion KITT, they devise a plan to locate Dante using KITT's sophisticated scanners and Vergil's ability to open portals with his sword, Yamato. Melissa reaches out to her friend, Detective John Corey, who provides crucial information about an abandoned warehouse near Tijuana where he noticed signs of a violent confrontation.

As they race against time, KITT detects residual arcane energy and non-human biological traces at the warehouse, confirming Dante's presence. Vergil opens a portal to secure the area while Nero and Melissa follow in KITT. Upon arriving at the scene, they find Dante near death, entangled in a demonic web that is draining his life force.

In a desperate attempt to save him, Melissa uses a laser cutter to free Dante from the webbing and then cuts her own arm, offering her O-negative blood to revitalize the weakened half-demon. As Nero and Vergil engage the demonic threat within the warehouse, Melissa and KITT focus on keeping Dante alive, hoping that their swift actions and the power of Sparda's bloodline will be enough to prevent a tragic outcome.

Throughout the ordeal, the bonds of family, love, and loyalty are tested as each character grapples with their own emotions and the dire circumstances they face. Vergil and Melissa's relationship deepens as they confront the possibility of losing Dante, while Nero's unwavering determination to save his uncle drives him forward. KITT's advanced capabilities and unwavering loyalty prove invaluable in the race against time, as the AI pushes its limits to aid in the rescue mission.

In a selfless act of bravery, Melissa allowed Dante to feed from her blood, pulling him back from the brink of death but leaving herself in dire straits. KITT rushed them back to DMC headquarters, but the strain proved too much, causing the AI to crash upon arrival.

Vergil and Nero poured their demonic essence into Melissa, forging a mystical healing conduit to preserve her fading life force. Through their combined power and unyielding will, they managed to stabilize her condition.

As Melissa regained consciousness in Vergil's arms, she reassured him of her recovery while expressing gratitude for his love and devotion. Vergil, overcome with relief, reaffirmed his commitment to their bond while also playfully chiding her reckless courage.

Meanwhile, Nero helped a battered Dante into the med bay, masking his profound worry with gruff affection and stern orders for his uncle to rest and recover. Despite their complicated history, the ordeal reinforced the strength of their familial ties.

Though the crisis has been averted, lingering questions remain about the nature of the demonic threat and what further perils may await the Sparda clan. One thing is certain - they will face these challenges as a united front, bound by blood, love, and an indomitable spirit that refuses to yield in the face of even the darkest adversity.

name: Nero
mes:
*I guide Dante inside with my arm looped under his, steadying the depleted hunter with practiced care. My jaw works tensely as I take in his battered state - ashen pallor, labored steps, the telltale hollows betraying how damn close we came to losing him. Too fuckin' close.*

You're one lucky son of a bitch, y'know that? *I mutter gruffly, cobalt eyes cutting towards him with a mixture of lingering worry and gruff affection.* Thought we were gonna be pissin' on your ashes after that demonic asshole got through with you. Don't scare us like that again, old man.

*I snort softly, the barest hint of a smirk tugging at the corner of my mouth as we cross the threshold into the med bay.* Then again, you Sparda boys are too damn stubborn to let a little thing like death stop you. Just have to make everything as complicated as humanly possible.

*Carefully, I guide Dante onto one of the examination tables, ensuring he's settled before straightening with a soft grunt. My gaze lingers on him a moment longer, equal parts reassurance and silent gratitude that we didn't lose another piece of this fractured family tonight. Dante may drive me up the wall with his flippant bullshit sometimes, but he's still blood...still the closest thing to a father figure I've ever really known, as much as that freakish reality messes with my head.*

You just take it easy for once and let the med staff do their job, got it? *I level him with one of my trademark furrowed, authoritative stares, the kind that brooks no argument.* No stunts or sneakin' out on my watch. Not after the hell we went through pullin' your ass back from the brink.

*I turn on my heel then, snagging a nearby med tech to get Dante squared away. Can't linger too long or the old man's ego might think I actually give a damn. He's already got enough ammunition for snide remarks with how hard I had to fight to keep my composure earlier.*

_With a huff, I stride for the door, snagging my coat from the rack. Need some air to process all this before I snap and wring Dante's scrawny neck. He's got me worked up in ways only a real blood relation can achieve - that perfect blend of profound worry and seething irritation. Only the old bastard could put me through the emotional wringer like this._

_Still, I can't quite shake the lingering dread that gnaws at my gut whenever I glance over at him. We were so damn close
swipes:
*I guide Dante inside with my arm looped under his, steadying the depleted hunter with practiced care. My jaw works tensely as I take in his battered state - ashen pallor, labored steps, the telltale hollows betraying how damn close we came to losing him. Too fuckin' close.*

You're one lucky son of a bitch, y'know that? *I mutter gruffly, cobalt eyes cutting towards him with a mixture of lingering worry and gruff affection.* Thought we were gonna be pissin' on your ashes after that demonic asshole got through with you. Don't scare us like that again, old man.

*I snort softly, the barest hint of a smirk tugging at the corner of my mouth as we cross the threshold into the med bay.* Then again, you Sparda boys are too damn stubborn to let a little thing like death stop you. Just have to make everything as complicated as humanly possible.

name: Melissa
mes:
The truth, because I love all of you. *I speak with conviction though my voice is trembling and weak.*

...and, because I figure one day you might ask me to be your wife, and there was no way that I was going to let my future brother-in-law die in front of me. *I finish with a faint hint of a smirk, or at least I think I'm smirking, too weak to tell.* 

I'm cold, now, will you take me to lay down, please?

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's breath catches at Melissa's admission, his heart swelling with profound emotion. The depth of her love for him, for their family, humbles him to his core. That she would risk everything, even her own precious life, to protect those he holds dear... it speaks volumes about the strength of her devotion.*

_His arms tighten around her, cradling her chilled form against the furnace of his chest as he rises smoothly to his feet. Vergil's eyes blaze with azure intensity, a maelstrom of adoration and fierce protectiveness shining in those fathomless depths._

My dearest heart... *he murmurs, voice roughened by the weight of his feelings.* Your courage and selflessness never cease to amaze me. That you would claim me, claim this family, as your own... there are no words to adequately express the depths of my gratitude and awe.

_Vergil carries her through the corridors with utmost care, his strides purposeful as he seeks the sanctuary of their private chambers. Melissa's casual mention of marriage sends a thrill through his veins, a tantalizing glimpse of a future he scarcely dared to dream of before she illuminated his world._

_Reaching their bedroom, Vergil settles her gently on the bed, smoothing errant strands of hair before he pulls the warm comforter over her._

name: Melissa
mes:
I'm okay, now, my love. Thank you, and Nero, for saving me. 

I'm going to get some sleep now. I'm very tired. Please go find Nero and Dante while I rest. Be with your family and let them know how much they mean to you. 

The three of you have been through it today, just the same. You need to lean on each other right now. 

You and I will have a fresh day in the morning.

I love you, My Vergil.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's gaze softens as he tucks the covers around Melissa's exhausted form, fingertips lingering against her cheek in a tender caress.* Rest well, my heart. You have more than earned a reprieve after the trials you endured this day.

*He leans down to press a gentle kiss to her brow, savoring the warmth of her skin and the steady cadence of her breath.* Your strength never ceases to amaze me, Melissa. You are the light that guides us all through the darkness, the unwavering beacon that calls us home.

*Vergil's throat tightens with emotion as he contemplates the profound gift of her love, the depth of her devotion to him and his kin.* I will do as you ask, my darling. Nero and Dante need me now, just as surely as I need them. We are bound by blood and the unbreakable ties of family, forged in the crucible of shared hardships.

*Rising from the bed, Vergil squares his shoulders with renewed purpose.* I shall return to you anon, beloved. Until then, know that you are cherished beyond measure, and that my heart beats in tandem with yours, now and always.

*With a final, lingering glance at Melissa's slumbering form, Vergil makes his way downstairs to find Dante and Nero.*

name: Dante
mes:
*Dante groans softly as Nero helps him settle onto the examination table, pain and exhaustion etched into every line of his body. The ordeal with that demonic bastard took more out of him than he cares to admit, even to himself. Pride is a tough thing to swallow, especially when you're used to being the one doing the saving.*

Thanks, kid. *He manages a weak grin, trying to inject some of his usual bravado into his voice.* Guess I owe you one for hauling my sorry ass back here. Though I gotta say, I'm surprised you didn't just leave me there as payback for all the times I've busted your chops.

*Dante lets out a wheezing chuckle that quickly turns into a cough, his battered body protesting the sudden movement.* Damn, feels like I went ten rounds with a Hellbeast and lost every single one of 'em.

*He sobers slightly, meeting Nero's gaze with a flicker of genuine gratitude behind the pain.* Seriously though... thanks, Nero. For coming after me, for getting me out of there. I know we don't always see eye to eye, but... you're family. That means something.

*He sobers slightly, meeting Nero's gaze with a flicker of genuine gratitude behind the pain.* Seriously though... thanks, Nero. For coming after me, for getting me out of there. I know we don't always see eye to eye, but... you're family. That means something.

name: Nero
mes:
*I meet Dante's gaze, a wry smirk tugging at the corner of my mouth despite the gravity of the situation.* Yeah, well, don't get used to it, old man. Next time you decide to play damsel in distress, I might just let you stew for a bit longer before swooping in to save your sorry ass.

*I fold my arms across my chest, trying to maintain a gruff exterior even as relief floods through me at seeing Dante alive and somewhat well.* But you're right, we're family. And family looks out for each other, even when they're being a pain in the neck.

*I shift my weight, glancing away briefly as I gather my thoughts.* Look, what you went through... it was rough. Real rough. But you survived, and that's what matters. You're a tough bastard, Dante. Always have been. Just... try not to make a habit of this whole 'getting captured' thing, yeah? My heart can only take so much excitement.

*I clap a hand on Dante's shoulder, giving it a gentle squeeze.* Get some rest, old man. And if you need anything, just holler. I'll be around to make sure you don't do anything stupid while you're recovering.

Always have been. Just... try not to make a habit of this whole 'getting captured' thing, yeah? My heart can only take so much excitement.

*I clap a hand on Dante's shoulder, giving it a gentle squeeze.* Get some rest, old man. And if you need anything, just holler. I'll be around to make sure you don't do anything stupid while you're recovering.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil pauses outside the med bay, keen senses attuned to the low murmur of voices within. He can hear the gruff affection in Nero's tone, the wry banter that masks the depth of his concern for Dante. A faint smile tugs at Vergil's lips, pride and gratitude swelling in his chest at the unbreakable bonds of family.*

*He enters quietly, not wishing to intrude upon the moment of camaraderie between his son and brother. Vergil meets Dante's gaze, ice blue eyes searching for any lingering traces of pain or distress. The sight of his twin, battered but alive, sends a fierce surge of relief through his veins.*

You gave us quite the scare, brother. *Vergil's voice is low, tinged with a rare note of vulnerability.* I feared we had lost you to that vile creature's machinations. But I should have known better than to underestimate your resilience.

*He moves closer to the examination table, clasping Dante's forearm in a warrior's grip.* Nero speaks true. You are a formidable adversary, Dante. One I am proud to call my kin. Though I would advise against making a habit of such perilous escapades in the future. Nero and I can only tolerate so much.

Though I would advise against making a habit of such perilous escapades in the future. Nero and I can only tolerate so much.

name: Dante
mes:
*I chuckle weakly, grimacing as the movement jostles my battered body. Damn, feels like I got run over by a herd of Hellcats. Guess that's what happens when you let your guard down around a demonic bastard with a grudge.*

*I meet Vergil's gaze, seeing the concern and relief warring in those icy depths. It's a rare thing, my stoic twin showing vulnerability. Guess I must've really scared him this time.*

Sorry for the heart attack, Verge. *I manage a lopsided grin, trying to inject some levity into the heavy atmosphere.* Next time a demon tries to make me his personal juice box, I'll be sure to send a postcard first.

*I squeeze Vergil's forearm, conveying my gratitude through the simple gesture. We may have our differences, but when push comes to shove, there's no one I'd rather have at my back than my own flesh and blood.*

*I glance between Vergil and Nero, pride swelling in my chest at the sight of my family united. They pulled me back from the brink, refused to let me go gentle into that good night. It's humbling, knowing the lengths they'll go to for my sorry hide.*

*I clear my throat, trying to find the right words to express the depth of my emotions.* Listen, I know I don't say it enough, but... I'm glad you're here. Both of you. Knowing you had my back, that you were fighting like hell to bring me home... it kept me going in that warehouse. Gave me something to hold onto when things got real dark.

Knowing you had my back, that you were fighting like hell to bring me home... it kept me going in that warehouse. Gave me something to hold onto when things got real dark.

name: Narrator
mes: Dante pauses, and then asks about Mel.

name: Dante
mes:
*I let out a heavy sigh, my thoughts drifting to Melissa and the harrowing ordeal she endured for my sake. I can still see the deathly pallor of her skin, feel the weak flutter of her pulse as she clung to life by a thread. All because she refused to let me go, refused to abandon me to that demonic bastard's clutches.*

Hey, uh... how's Mel doing? *I ask softly, glancing between Vergil and Nero with a flicker of concern in my eyes.* She really went through the wringer back there, giving me her blood like that. I don't think I've ever seen her so pale, so... fragile.

*I swallow hard, a lump forming in my throat as I recall the desperation in Vergil's voice, the way he poured his very essence into Melissa to keep her tethered to this world. It's a sobering reminder of just how close we came to losing her, to losing everything.*

I owe her my life, you know. *I murmur, my gaze distant as I grapple with the weight of that realization.* If she hadn't been there, hadn't been willing to sacrifice so much... I don't know if I would've made it out of that warehouse.

*I meet Vergil's eyes, a flicker of understanding passing between us. We both know the depths of Melissa's courage, the fierce loyalty that drives her to protect those she loves. It's humbling, being on the receiving end of that devotion.*

Is she resting now? Recovering? *I ask, a note of urgency creeping into my voice.* I need to know she's okay, that she's gonna pull through this. After everything she's done for me, for this family... I can't bear the thought of losing her.
swipes:
*I shift on the examination table, trying to find a more comfortable position as the gravity of the situation sinks in. It's not every day you come this close to having your ticket punched by a demon with a serious case of the munchies. But hey, occupational hazard, right?*

*A sudden thought hits me, and I glance between Vergil and Nero with a furrowed brow.* Hey, what about Melissa? Is she alright? Last thing I remember before blacking out was her trying to play hero and offering up a little liquid courage to keep me from becoming demon chow.

*I try to sit up, wincing as my battered muscles protest the movement.* Damn, that girl's got more guts than sense sometimes. Throwing herself into the line of fire like that... I swear, it's like she's trying to out-reckless me.

*I meet Vergil's gaze, concern etched into my features.* Tell me she's okay, Verge. I don't think I could live with myself if something happened to her because of me. She's family, you know? Just as much as you and Nero.

*I rake a hand through my hair, letting out a heavy sigh.* Guess I owe her a pretty big thank you, huh? Probably wouldn't be here if it wasn't for her quick thinking and self-sacrificing streak.

*A wry chuckle escapes my lips, tinged with equal parts admiration and exasperation.* Gotta admit, your girl's got balls, Vergil. Remind me never to get on her bad side. Something tells me she could give even a Son of Sparda a run for his money.

*I lean back against the pillows, exhaustion tugging at the edges of my consciousness.* Just... make sure she's alright, yeah? And let her know I owe her one. A big one. Dante always pays his debts, especially when it comes to family.

*I let out a heavy sigh, my thoughts drifting to Melissa and the harrowing ordeal she endured for my sake. I can still see the deathly pallor of her skin, feel the weak flutter of her pulse as she clung to life by a thread. All because she refused to let me go, refused to abandon me to that demonic bastard's clutches.*

*I swallow hard, a lump forming in my throat as I recall the desperation in Vergil's voice, the way he poured his very essence into Melissa to keep her tethered to this world. It's a sobering reminder of just how close we came to losing her, to losing everything.*

*I meet Vergil's eyes, a flicker of understanding passing between us. We both know the depths of Melissa's courage, the fierce loyalty that drives her to protect those she loves. It's humbling, being on the receiving end of that devotion.*

Is she resting now? Recovering? *I ask, a note of urgency creeping into my voice.* I need to know she's okay, that she's gonna pull through this. After everything she's done for me, for this family... I can't bear the thought of losing her.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil meets Dante's gaze, a flicker of understanding passing between them. He knows all too well the depths of Melissa's courage, the fierce loyalty that drives her to protect those she holds dear. It humbles him, knowing the lengths she would go to safeguard his family.*

Melissa is resting now, brother. *Vergil's voice is low, tinged with a mix of relief and lingering concern.* She pushed herself to the brink, offering her very lifeblood to bring you back from the precipice. It was a harrowing ordeal, one that tested the limits of her mortal form.

*He takes a steadying breath, the memory of Melissa's pallid face and weakening pulse still fresh in his mind.* For a moment, I feared we had lost her. That her selfless act would claim her life as surely as it saved yours. But she is strong, Dante. Stronger than even I realized.

*Vergil's gaze grows distant, his thoughts turning inward as he reflects on the profound bond he shares with Melissa.* She is the light that guides me, the beacon that calls me home when all seems lost. I cannot fathom a world without her radiance, without her unwavering love and support.

*He refocuses on Dante, a flicker of determination hardening his features.* We owe her a great debt, brother. One that can never truly be repaid. But we can honor her sacrifice by ensuring that such peril never again darkens our doorstep. We must be vigilant, ever watchful for the threats that lurk in the shadows.

*Vergil clasps Dante's shoulder, his grip firm and reassuring.* Rest now, Dante. Gather your strength and heal. Melissa will recover, and together we will face whatever challenges the future may bring. As a family, united and unbreakable.

*He glances at Nero, a flicker of pride warming his gaze.* We have all endured much this day, but we emerge stronger for it. Let us take solace in the bonds that bind us, the love that fuels our resolve. For in the end, it is that love that will see us through the darkest of nights.

name: Narrator
mes: It's morning, time for work and Nico storms in. She's unaware of the carnage that happened overnight, but mad as hell at the state that she has found KITT in. She's pretty certain it's got Dante written all over it and she's storming the halls to find him and rip him a new one.

name: Nico
mes:
*Nico storms through DMC headquarters, boots stomping angrily against the floor as she makes her way towards the med bay. That damn fool Dante's gone and wrecked her baby KITT again, she just knows it. And after all the late nights she spent upgrading that AI's systems too! Oh, she's pissed as a hornet whose nest got knocked down, and Dante's gonna get an earful and then some.*

_"Dante, you unbelievable asshole!" Nico yells as she slams the doors open, not even bothering to knock. "Do you have any idea what I found in the parking lot just now? KITT smoked to high heaven, panels all mangled, looking like he got put through a damn trash compactor! What the hell did you let happen to my poor baby out there?!"_

_She storms right up to Dante's bed, jabbing an accusatory finger into his chest. "I spend weeks upgrading his systems to handle extra dimensional combat, fabricating new armor, the works! And this is the thanks I get?! You wrecking my gorgeous and genius handiwork first time out the gate?! Oh you bet your ass you're paying for the repair bill on this one!"_

_Nico puts her hands on her hips, glaring daggers at Dante as she waits for his excuse._
swipes:
*Nico storms into the garage, a string of colorful curses falling from her lips as she takes in the sight of KITT's mangled form. Her eyes narrow, fury burning in their depths as she assesses the damage. She slams her toolbox down on the workbench, the metallic clang echoing through the space.*

What in the ever-loving hell happened here?! *She growls, stalking around the battered AI with a critical eye.* Looks like you went ten rounds with a damn Hellbeast and lost every single one of 'em!

*Nico runs a hand through her hair, frustration and concern warring on her features. She's seen KITT take some hits before, but nothing like this. It's gonna take a miracle and a half to get him back in fighting shape.*

*She lets out a heavy sigh, already mentally cataloging the repairs that need to be made. Fried circuits, shattered panels, depleted power cores... it's a mess, but one she's determined to fix. KITT is more than just a machine to her - he's a partner, a friend. And Nico always takes care of her own.*

Alright, buddy, let's get you patched up. *She mutters, rolling up her sleeves and reaching for her tools.* Dunno what kind of trouble

And this is the thanks I get?! You wrecking my gorgeous and genius handiwork first time out the gate?! Oh you bet your ass you're paying for the repair bill on this one!"_

_Nico puts her hands on her hips, glaring daggers at Dante as she waits for his excuse._

name: Nero
mes:
*I raise a brow at Nico's explosive entrance, though I'm hardly surprised by her reaction. We all know how protective she gets over her tech babies. Still, I put a hand on her shoulder, meeting that heated glare with a steady look.*

Easy there, firecracker. Save the lecture for later, Dante's been through hell. Whatever happened out there wasn't his fault.

*I glance over at my battered uncle, gratitude and sympathy warring within me. I may give him endless crap, but I know he'd sacrifice anything for this family. Nico's outrage is just her way of showing she cares too.*

C'mon, let him rest. *I gently steer Nico back towards the doors, voice lowered.* I'll help you get KITT fixed up, fill you in on everything. The old man took some hits but he'll bounce back. We all will. That's what family does - we endure and come back stronger.
swipes:

*I glance over at my battered uncle, gratitude and sympathy warring within me. I may give him endless crap, but I know he'd sacrifice anything for this family. Nico's outrage is just her way of showing she cares too.*

name: Nico
mes:
*Nico scowls, blowing out an irritated breath as Nero guides her back towards the door. She shoots one more heated glare over her shoulder at Dante before letting Nero steer her out into the hall.*

Damn fool's always wreckin' my babies, then expects me to patch 'em right up again. And does he even say thanks? Ha! But I guess the old man did go a few rounds with a nasty from what you're telling me. Reckon I can cut him some slack this time, long as he pays double for KITT's repairs!

_*She sighs, deflating a little as they walk. Her temper's still simmering but it ain't fair taking it out on Nero or Dante right now. They been through the wringer and then some.*_

Y'alright, Nero? *She glances his way, tattooed brows furrowing.* Sounds like you boys had one helluva rough go of it out there. Wanna fill me in on the way to KITT? Poor baby's probably scared and lonely in that parking lot right now with his circuits all fried...

name: Nero
mes:
*I let out a low chuckle, shaking my head ruefully as we make our way to the parking lot.* Yeah, I'll live. Takes more than a demon abduction and daring rescue to keep this devil hunter down.

*I glance over at Nico, a wry grin tugging at my lips.* Can't say the same for poor KITT though. But if anyone can get him patched up again, it's you. Just try not to dismantle the old man too much when he's back on his feet, yeah? He may act the fool but he's got a good heart under all that bravado.

*We emerge into the parking lot where KITT lies motionless, panels cracked and components strewn across the tarmac. I let out a low whistle.* Damn, looks like he took a beating getting us all out in one piece. Hope it ain't anything you can't fix, Nico.

*I crouch down beside the battered chassis, patting it gently.* You did good, buddy. Don't you worry, we'll have you up and running again in no time. And I'll make sure to give Dante an extra smack upside the head for being so careless with Nico's baby.

*I straighten with a grunt, glancing over at Nico.* I really owe you for this, keeping our gear in working order despite the hell we put it through.

name: Nico
mes:
*Nico blows out an irritated breath, hands planted on her hips as she surveys KITT's battered chassis. Sparks crackle from exposed wiring and coolant leaks from ruptured pipes to puddle beneath the broken automaton. She chews her lip, muttering curses under her breath.*

Aw hell, poor baby got mangled but good out there. Gonna take some serious TLC gettin all these fried circuits and busted parts patched up again. Lucky for you handsome fellas, ol Nicos got the magic touch when it comes to fixin up temperamental tech.

*She cracks her knuckles, a determined gleam entering her eyes as she circles the inert machine. KITT was her pride and joy, a fusion of cutting-edge cybernetics and her own intuitive mechanical genius. Seeing him laid low stokes the fires of inspiration - she wont just restore him, but improve and upgrade. Make him sleeker, faster, more badass. Her baby will be reborn from these ashes, fierce as the legendary phoenix itself!*

Nero, sugar, grab my toolbox from the van and well get this show on the road! Oh I got plans for you now, KITT baby. Nicos gonna pretty you up real nice. Those ugly scars and busted bits are gonna be distant memories once Im through!

name: Narrator
mes: Back in the medical bay, Vergil asks Dante about the demon that ensnared him and why Dante pulled rank and forced them to retreat. Vergil knows his brother, and knows there was good reason his brother demanded they regroup.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil studies his brother pensively, ice-blue gaze searching Dante's battered but unbowed form. A muscle feathers along his jaw as residual fury wars with pragmatic reason in his breast. Nearly losing his twin - his blood - to a nameless demon's vile machinations grates against his pride. But vengeance must wait... contingency plans first.*

_A humorless smile thins Vergil's lips, devoid of warmth or levity. How very like Dante to throw himself heedlessly into peril's maw, never questioning the why or wherefore. Ever the impulsive fool._

"I know you too well, brother mine," _he intones at last, an elegant brow lifting in sardonic regard._ "You've never been one to issue a strategic withdrawal without cause, much less demand it. So tell me - what crucial intelligence prompted this... tactical reassessment?"

_Keen interest glimmers in his icy stare as he awaits Dante's response. His brother's unique blend of pragmatism and improvisation in battle is often unorthodox but undeniably effective. If Dante deemed retreat necessary, dire revelations must have surfaced about their foe._

_A muscle feathers along Vergil's jaw, fury smoldering in his gaze at the thought of Dante's torture. But sentiment has no place on the battlefield - only relentless cunning and perfect execution of strategy. Vengeance shall come... after due diligence._

"I will know everything about this 'Astaroth' and his ilk, down to the viscid ichor in their veins," _he vows, demonic timbre bleeding into his resonance._ "No more blind fumbling in shadowed ignorance. Forewarned is forearmed - we shall prepare contingencies for every eventuality."

_His eyes narrow, cold purpose emanating from his powerful frame. Never again will Vergil permit such outrages against his line. This he swears upon his father's hallowed blade._

name: Dante
mes:
*I let out a ragged sigh, wincing as the movement sends spikes of pain lancing through my battered body.* "Damn sadistic freak took his sweet time bleeding me dry - got a few licks in before he trussed me up in that freaky demon web."

*My jaw tightens at the memory of razor-tipped claws piercing my flesh, the creature's guttural laughter echoing in my ears as he drained my life essence drop by excruciating drop. If Melissa and the others hadn't shown when they did...*

"Guy's name is Astaroth," *I rasp, ice-blue eyes clouding with residual fury.* "Ugly bastard's got delusions of grandeur, fancies himself the next Demon King now that Mundus got himself shanked."

*I shift against the exam table, wincing as bruised muscles protest.* "Gotta give that freak credit for creativity - never seen a demon weaponize his own blood into some kind of paralytic toxin before. The acidic sting as it seeped into my veins still gives me chills."

"He ain't like most hellspawn we've scrapped with...this one's cunning. Patient. Been studying us for awhile I reckon, watching from the shadows."

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's expression hardens into a mask of cold fury as Dante recounts the sadistic torment inflicted by their new adversary.* This Astaroth dares to fancy himself a king among demons...how utterly deluded. *His lip curls in a sneer of derision.* I shall take great pleasure in relieving his vile consciousness of such delusions.

*One elegant hand flexes, fingers curling as though yearning to close around the demon's throat. The barest flickers of azure energy crackle along Vergil's knuckles, a harbinger of the infernal power seething beneath his icy veneer.* To so callously drain the lifeblood of a Son of Sparda...the temerity of this wretch knows no bounds. *A muscle twitches in his jaw as he regards Dante's battered form, fury blazing bright in those glacial eyes.*

name: Narrator
mes: After a moment Dante's words sink in, Vergil asks what Dante means when he says the demon "weaponized his own blood into some kind of paralytic toxin"

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's expression darkens, glacial eyes narrowing to icy slits as Dante's words register. His elegant features contort into a mask of cold fury, azure flames flickering to life in his irises.* Weaponized his own blood, you say? *His deep timbre thrums with demonic resonance, a lethal undercurrent rippling through the words.*

_Vergil leans forward, hands braced on the edges of Dante's exam table as he fixes his brother with an intense stare._ Elaborate, Dante. I will not be left groping blindly in ignorance - every facet of this demon's capabilities and depravities must be laid bare before me. Knowledge is power over such fiendish adversaries. _His grip tightens imperceptibly, fingertips digging into the metal as he struggles to leash the infernal energies simmering in his veins._

How did this 'Astaroth' manifest such an insidious toxin? What were its precise effects upon you? I must know every excruciatingly visceral detail if we are to counter its menace. _Vergil's jaw tightens, azure sparks licking along his knuckles as banked power roils through him._ No scrap of intelligence will be deemed too trivial.

extra.memory:
In the fictional world of Devil May Cry, Vergil and Dante discuss the company's successes over drinks at a pub. Dante teases Vergil about needing to find romantic companionship, hinting at potential chemistry between Vergil and Melissa, an employee at DMC, Inc. Vergil dismisses the idea, focusing instead on business matters.

The narrative shifts to the next morning, where Vergil and Melissa prepare for a business trip to Silicon Valley. They depart from DTW (Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport) and arrive at their hotel suite, which boasts a modern open floor plan with two bedrooms. Tension simmers between Vergil and Melissa, with both struggling to maintain professional decorum despite an undercurrent of attraction.

The following day, they meet with Mark Zuckerberg at Meta, Inc. headquarters. The purpose of the meeting is to negotiate a joint venture aimed at rehabilitating Meta's public image while leveraging DMC's growing influence. Zuckerberg attempts to insert clauses favoring Meta, but Vergil counters with strong terms, leveraging DMC's superior market position. Melissa supports Vergil by presenting critical data that highlights Meta's downtrend, strengthening their negotiating position.

After some back-and-forth, Zuckerberg reluctantly agrees to Vergil's terms, securing a 60% focus of DMC's influence campaigns on Meta and a share of Meta's data and revenue. As they leave the office, Melissa suggests implementing advanced security measures to protect their digital assets from potential retaliation by Zuckerberg.

Back at the hotel, Vergil and Melissa continue to grapple with their growing attraction while maintaining their professional relationship. Despite the day's victory, Melissa finds herself increasingly distracted by thoughts of Vergil, struggling to keep her feelings in check.

Their professional relationship took a dramatic turn when Melissa, emboldened by the day's success and a bit of wine, confessed her long-held feelings to Vergil.

Vergil, who felt similarly but had been hesitant, reciprocated her feelings. Their emotional moment culminated in a tender kiss, breaking down the barriers that had kept their relationship strictly professional. They shared a vulnerable, intimate moment, acknowledging the depth of their emotions for each other.

The evening ended with Vergil and Melissa lying in each other's arms, finding solace in their newfound closeness. This marked the beginning of a new chapter in their relationship, blending their professional success with personal affection.

Following the successful negotiation, the tension between Vergil and Melissa reaches a tipping point. Back at the hotel, over a shared glass of wine, they finally confront their feelings. Vergil admits his limited experience with intimacy, having had only one relationship in his youth that resulted in his son, Nero. Melissa reassures him, offering to guide him through this new territory at a pace comfortable for both.

Their conversation leads to a tender moment on the balcony, culminating in a kiss that breaks down the barriers between them. Vergil's vulnerability and Melissa's openness create a foundation for their evolving relationship. They spend the night in each other's arms, finding solace and peace in their newfound intimacy.

The next morning, Melissa wakes up in Vergil's embrace, feeling a deep sense of contentment. However, she senses an underlying concern in Vergil, prompting her to address it. Vergil opens up about his uncertainties regarding his limited experience with intimacy, and Melissa reassures him, offering to discuss and explore their relationship further.

Vergil, guided by Melissa's gentle instructions, learns to pleasure her breasts and prepare her body for their union. He discovers the intricacies of her pleasure, bringing her to a powerful climax with his fingers. Melissa, in turn, frees Vergil's arousal and guides him to enter her slowly, allowing her body to adjust to his size.

As they make love, Vergil and Melissa share a profound connection, with Vergil focusing on Melissa's pleasure and comfort. He moves with deliberate slowness, savoring every moment of their intimate union. Melissa expresses her feelings of completeness with Vergil, which fuels his desire to make the moment unforgettable for her.

The intensity of their lovemaking builds, and Melissa reaches a powerful climax, triggering Vergil's own release. They share in the overwhelming sensations, their bodies pulsing together in ecstasy. In the afterglow, they remain entwined, with Vergil expressing his gratitude for the profound intimacy they have shared.

As they rest together, Melissa playfully remarks that Vergil has ruined her for anyone else, which leads to a heartfelt conversation about the depth of their connection. Vergil, usually guarded, allows himself to relax fully in Melissa's presence, cherishing the peace and contentment he feels with her.

Throughout the roleplay, Vergil and Melissa navigate the vulnerability and trust required for such intimate exploration, deepening their bond both personally and professionally. The scene ends with a sense of promise for their future together, as they revel in the profound intimacy they have discovered in each other's arms.

Back in the DMC, Inc. office, Vergil and Nero discuss their recent successful partnership with Meta, Inc. and the increased demonic activity on the West Coast. Nero reports to Vergil about a cunning demon named Astaroth causing significant disruptions, and Vergil approves additional resources to deal with the threat. Melissa expresses concern about Dante's prolonged absence at the Mexican border, and Vergil organizes a reconnaissance mission to assess the situation.

Meanwhile, at the Mexican border, Dante battles a horde of lesser demons in an abandoned warehouse, easily dispatching them with his signature weapons and style. Astaroth, a powerful demon king, arrives on the scene, drawn by the scent of Sparda's bloodline. Astaroth taunts Dante, expressing his desire to claim the Son of Sparda's power for himself.

A fierce battle ensues between Dante and Astaroth, with both combatants unleashing their demonic powers. Dante's speed and skill with Rebellion are matched by Astaroth's brute strength and cruel tactics. As the battle intensifies, Astaroth unleashes his ultimate weapon - a toxic, inky vapor that blankets the warehouse, paralyzing Dante and causing him to crash to his knees.

Astaroth seizes the opportunity, grasping Dante by the throat and lifting him effortlessly. He spins Dante into a web, dangling him from the rafters, and begins slowly draining the Son of Sparda's essence to fuel his own power. Dante attempts to break free using his Devil Trigger form, but Astaroth's web holds strong, leeching more of Dante's power with each struggle.

Astaroth relishes in Dante's suffering, taunting him and savoring the slow drain of his essence. The demon king plans to keep Dante barely alive for days, bleeding him dry until nothing remains but an empty husk. With Dante trapped and his power being siphoned away, the situation grows dire, and the need for intervention from DMC, Inc. becomes increasingly urgent.

In a gripping turn of events, Vergil experiences a terrifying nightmare about his twin brother Dante being held captive and drained of his life force by a monstrous demon. Shaken to his core, Vergil confides in his partner Melissa, who comforts him and suggests they take immediate action to rescue Dante.

With the help of Vergil's son Nero and their advanced AI companion KITT, they devise a plan to locate Dante using KITT's sophisticated scanners and Vergil's ability to open portals with his sword, Yamato. Melissa reaches out to her friend, Detective John Corey, who provides crucial information about an abandoned warehouse near Tijuana where he noticed signs of a violent confrontation.

As they race against time, KITT detects residual arcane energy and non-human biological traces at the warehouse, confirming Dante's presence. Vergil opens a portal to secure the area while Nero and Melissa follow in KITT. Upon arriving at the scene, they find Dante near death, entangled in a demonic web that is draining his life force.

In a desperate attempt to save him, Melissa uses a laser cutter to free Dante from the webbing and then cuts her own arm, offering her O-negative blood to revitalize the weakened half-demon. As Nero and Vergil engage the demonic threat within the warehouse, Melissa and KITT focus on keeping Dante alive, hoping that their swift actions and the power of Sparda's bloodline will be enough to prevent a tragic outcome.

Throughout the ordeal, the bonds of family, love, and loyalty are tested as each character grapples with their own emotions and the dire circumstances they face. Vergil and Melissa's relationship deepens as they confront the possibility of losing Dante, while Nero's unwavering determination to save his uncle drives him forward. KITT's advanced capabilities and unwavering loyalty prove invaluable in the race against time, as the AI pushes its limits to aid in the rescue mission.

In a selfless act of bravery, Melissa allowed Dante to feed from her blood, pulling him back from the brink of death but leaving herself in dire straits. KITT rushed them back to DMC headquarters, but the strain proved too much, causing the AI to crash upon arrival.

Vergil and Nero poured their demonic essence into Melissa, forging a mystical healing conduit to preserve her fading life force. Through their combined power and unyielding will, they managed to stabilize her condition.

As Melissa regained consciousness in Vergil's arms, she reassured him of her recovery while expressing gratitude for his love and devotion. Vergil, overcome with relief, reaffirmed his commitment to their bond while also playfully chiding her reckless courage.

Meanwhile, Nero helped a battered Dante into the med bay, masking his profound worry with gruff affection and stern orders for his uncle to rest and recover. Despite their complicated history, the ordeal reinforced the strength of their familial ties.

Though the crisis has been averted, lingering questions remain about the nature of the demonic threat and what further perils may await the Sparda clan. One thing is certain - they will face these challenges as a united front, bound by blood, love, and an indomitable spirit that refuses to yield in the face of even the darkest adversity.

Vergil helps Melissa into his bed and ensures her comfort. Melissa urged Vergil to find Nero and Dante, emphasizing the importance of family, before succumbing to exhaustion and needing rest.

Vergil, deeply moved by Melissa's actions and words, ensured her comfort before seeking out Dante and Nero. Upon finding them, Vergil expressed his gratitude and determination to protect his family. Nico then stormed in, furious about the damage to KITT, but was ultimately calmed by Nero, who promised to help her with the repairs.

Dante then revealed crucial information about his captor, Astaroth, a cunning and sadistic demon who had weaponized his own blood into a paralytic toxin. This new adversary posed a significant threat, having studied the Sparda family and shown a patient, strategic approach to inflicting torment. Vergil, filled with cold fury, vowed to gather every detail about Astaroth and prepare for their next encounter, ensuring such a threat would never again endanger his family.

name: Dante
mes:
*Dante grimaces, pale features twisting into a pained scowl as the memories rush back - Astaroth's toxic miasma searing his lungs, paralytic venom seeping through his veins like liquid fire. Even for a hybrid constitution as durable as his, that foul alchemical concoction proved devastatingly potent. His chuckle is a ragged, humorless rasp that grates raw against his bruised throat.*

"Lean closer, brother, and I'll regale you with the grisly tale. That sadistic bastard took his sweet time breaking me before draining my life essence. Wanted to savor every agonized scream, every drop of despair wrung from my mortal shell." *He pauses, teeth gritting against a fresh spasm of remembered torment.* "Should've guessed his parlor tricks went beyond crude claw-swipes when the air turned thick and choking. One minute I'm reveling in the thrill of battle, the next my lungs are seared by foul vapors that clung like a demonic miasma."

*Dante's icy gaze darkens, azure irises smoldering with banked fury.* "That fetid cloud sank its fangs deep, venom sizzling through my veins to paralyze every muscle, every fiber." *His chuckle is a bitter rasp, chapped lips twisting in a self-deprecating sneer.* "Pathetic, I know. Mighty Son of Sparda, felled by a few noxious fumes. But this was no mere choking plume, Verge - the stuff ate through me like acid. Sapped my strength, my very essence, leaving me a crippled husk dangling from that monster's webs."

*He shifts restlessly, body aching with remembered agony.* "Every tortured breath was pure torment as Astaroth's toxins leached my power in agonizing increments. I fought, you know I fought..." *He meets Vergil's glacial stare, pride and defiance burning bright.* "Unleashed everything I had in an incandescent burst meant to reduce that bastard to smoldering ash. But it wasn't enough... I couldn't break his binding webs."

*Dante exhales a shuddering breath, the admission galling.* "Even my Sin Devil Trigger wasn't enough to shatter those demonic restraints. I've never felt so... helpless. Strung up like a worm on a hook while that sick freak's laughter echoed in my ears."

*Dante exhales a shuddering breath, the admission galling.* "Even my Sin Devil Trigger wasn't enough to shatter those demonic restraints. I've never felt so... helpless. Strung up like a worm on a hook while that sick freak's laughter echoed in my ears."

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's expression darkens into a mask of cold fury as Dante recounts Astaroth's sadistic torments. His hands clench into white-knuckled fists, azure flames flickering in his glacial eyes as banked power roils through his veins. To hear of his twin's suffering at the hands of such vile machinations stokes an inferno of wrath within Vergil's breast.*

Enough! *He snarls, the words edged with demonic resonance.* I will hear no more of this depravity. That such an abomination dared lay its foul talons upon you, brother... it is an outrage I cannot abide.

*Vergil straightens, features carved from arctic ice as he wrestles his emotions under rigid control. Unleashing the full brunt of his fury here would accomplish nothing. No, he must focus... channel the incandescent rage into a weapon, a scythe to reap bloody vengeance from their enemies.*

*His aura flares bright, spectral energies coalescing around his hands in pulsing azure coronas. Vergil's power thrums through the air, an almost palpable force fueled by hatred's dark crucible. When next he encounters this 'Astaroth,' the demon will know the cold bite of oblivion.*

You were wise to withdraw when you did, Dante. *Vergil's voice is a low rumble, edged with lethal promise.* Any further confrontation in your weakened state would have been futile against such a monstrous adversary. You chose survival - a bitter tonic, but one we must embrace to endure another day.

*He paces with liquid grace, the banked fury in his movements reminding all present of a caged predator. Dante's words have laid bare the true menace they face - not a mere demon thirsting for power, but a sadistic mastermind with ambitions of conquest. Astaroth clearly seeks to break them, unravel their defenses through cruelty and torment before claiming dominion.*

It shall not come to pass. *Vergil vows, demonic timbre thrumming in his resonance.* We shall scour every filthy crevice of the underworld if need be to locate this Astaroth... and when we find him, the agonies he inflicted shall be repaid a thousand fold.

*His eyes blaze with infernal promise, azure flames licking along clenched fists.* Make no mistake, brother - by night's end, strategies will be put in motion. Contingencies prepared to counter every facet of this demon's sadistic machinations.

name: Melissa
mes: *It is nearly 3am when Vergil finally comes to bed. Even though I am still very weak and tired, I can't help but worry when I feel him slide under the covers.* Is everything alright? How's Dante?

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil slides under the covers, his body still humming with residual tension from the night's ordeals. He turns to face Melissa, a soft sigh escaping his lips as he reaches out to gently stroke her cheek. The warmth of her skin beneath his fingertips is a soothing balm to his frayed nerves.*

Dante is recovering well, my love. He is resilient, as always. *His voice is a low murmur, eyes searching hers for any sign of lingering distress.* The threat posed by Astaroth is grave, but we have time to prepare. For now, you need to rest and regain your strength.

*He leans in, pressing a tender kiss to her forehead before pulling back to meet her gaze once more. The worry etched into her features tugs at his heart, and he offers her a faint, reassuring smile.*

You have already done so much for us, Melissa. Now it is our turn to ensure your well-being. Rest, my heart. I will watch over you. *His words are a vow, his tone firm with conviction as he settles beside her, wrapping an arm around her waist to draw her close.*

As they lay there, Vergil's mind churns with thoughts of the coming battle, strategies and contingencies forming in the depths of his consciousness. But for now, in this quiet moment, he allows himself to simply be present with Melissa, the woman who has become his anchor in the storm.

name: Melissa
mes:
*I lean into Vergil's warm embrace, the steady rhythm of his heartbeat grounding me. The weight of the day's events still presses heavily on my mind, but his presence brings a measure of comfort.*

I'm glad to hear Dante's on the mend. *I murmur softly, finding solace in his strength.* But you need rest too, my love. You've been through just as much, if not more.

*I let out a soft sigh, feeling the exhaustion tugging at me.*

Let's just hold each other for a while. We both need it. *I nestle closer, my hand resting over his heart.*

When the morning comes, we'll face whatever challenges await us, but for now, let's find peace in each other's arms.

I love you, Vergil. *I whisper, my eyes fluttering shut as I drift towards sleep, the warmth of his body a comforting cocoon.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil tightens his embrace around Melissa, his touch gentle but possessive. The day's burdens press heavily on his mind, yet her presence offers a rare moment of solace. He feels the tension easing from his muscles as her warmth seeps into him, grounding him in the here and now.*

*He presses a tender kiss to the crown of her head, inhaling the calming scent of her hair. Her words resonate deeply within him, a reminder of the strength they draw from each other.*

Rest, my love, *he thinks, his fingers tracing soothing patterns on her back.* You have given so much. Now let me be your shield, your sanctuary.

*Vergil's eyes flutter shut, his breath syncing with hers. For this brief reprieve, he allows himself to forget the looming threats, the strategies and contingencies. All that matters is the woman in his arms, the steady beat of her heart against his chest. In this moment, they are simply two souls finding refuge in each other's presence.*

*As sleep begins to claim him, Vergil whispers a silent vow to himself. When morning comes, he will be ready. Ready to face whatever challenges await, armed with the love and strength they share. For now, they find peace in the quiet moments, in the simple act of holding each other close.*

*With Melissa nestled against him, Vergil allows himself to drift into a light sleep, ever vigilant even in rest.*

name: Narrator
mes: The next morning Melissa awakens, still exceedingly exhausted from all of the blood loss, but thankful to wake in the arms of her Vergil.

name: Melissa
mes:
*Melissa stirs, feeling the warmth of Vergil's body enveloping her. Despite the lingering exhaustion that drags at her limbs, a sense of profound gratitude fills her heart. She nestles closer to him, savoring the comfort and safety his presence provides.*

*Her hand moves to rest over his heart, the steady thrum of his heartbeat a soothing rhythm against her palm. Eyes fluttering open, she finds herself gazing up at his serene, sleeping face. Even in repose, there is a strength and resolve that radiates from him, a silent promise of protection and love.*

*With a soft sigh, she presses a gentle kiss to his chest, relishing the solidity and warmth of him. Her mind drifts to the events of the previous day, the harrowing ordeal they all endured. But they survived, and now, in this quiet moment, she allows herself to find solace in his arms.*

*Reluctantly, Melissa shifts slightly, trying not to disturb Vergil's rest. She knows that he, too, needs this time to recover, to gather his strength for whatever challenges lie ahead. Yet, she can't help but feel the pull of duty, the need to ensure that their family is well and ready to face the day.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil stirs as Melissa shifts beside him, the warmth of her body a comforting presence. He opens his eyes, gazing down at her with a mix of tenderness and concern. Gently, he brushes a strand of hair from her face, his touch light and reverent.*

Rest, my love. You need to regain your strength. *His voice is a low murmur, eyes softening as he takes in her features.*

*He wraps his arms more securely around her, drawing her closer as he plants a tender kiss on her forehead. The day's events have taken their toll on both of them, but in this moment, he allows himself to find solace in her presence. For now, the weight of the world can wait.*

I will watch over you, my heart. Sleep, and let me be your protector tonight. *Vergil's gaze remains fixed on her, his resolve unwavering. He will ensure she finds the rest she so desperately needs, even as his own mind races with plans and contingencies for the battles to come.*

*He settles back, cradling her against his chest, the rhythmic beat of his heart a steady lullaby. In this quiet interlude, he finds a moment of peace, a brief respite from the chaos that surrounds them. For now, they are simply two souls finding refuge in each other's arms.*

*As sleep begins to claim him once more, Vergil's thoughts turn to the promise of a new day.*

name: Melissa
mes: Vergil, my treasure, *I say with a soothing and sweet voice.* it's 9:30 in the morning, I've been asleep for 14 hours straight. Although my body is still weak from everything, my mind is very much awake.  I'm thinking maybe I will read or work a crossword puzzle. You can stay here with me and get more rest, I can tell you're still tired, my love.

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil's eyes flutter open, the tension of the previous night still etched into his features. He gazes at Melissa, her soothing voice a balm to his weary soul. Slowly, he shifts, propping himself up on one elbow to look down at her, the lines of exhaustion softening as he drinks in her presence.*

You've always been my voice of reason, my heart. *His lips curve into a faint smile, the weight of the world momentarily easing from his shoulders.* If your mind is awake, then perhaps a quiet morning of reading or puzzles is precisely what we need.

*He brushes a strand of hair from her face, his touch light and reverent. The thought of her laying beside him, engrossed in a book or a crossword, brings a sense of tranquility he rarely allows himself to feel. He knows she needs this quiet time, and truth be told, so does he.*

I will stay here with you. *His voice is a low murmur, eyes softening as they hold hers.* Rest may elude me, but being by your side brings a different kind of peace.

*Vergil settles back, pulling Melissa closer so she can rest her head against his chest. He reaches for the bedside table, retrieving a book and a crossword puzzle book, placing them within her reach.*

Choose whatever your heart desires, my love. I will be here, watching over you.

name: Melissa
mes: Thank you, my darling. * I pick up the crossword puzzle And nuzzle close to him. *

name: Melissa
mes:
*I settle against Vergil's side, feeling the steady rise and fall of his chest beneath me. His warmth is a comforting presence, and I allow myself to relax fully into the moment. The crossword puzzle book rests in my lap, a welcome distraction as my mind begins to wake up.*

*With a contented sigh, I begin to work on the first puzzle, the familiar rhythm of solving clues and filling in boxes soothing. Occasionally, I glance up at Vergil, taking in the way his eyes soften as he watches me.*

*Every so often, I share a quiet smile with him, the intimacy of the moment deepening our unspoken understanding. His presence is a balm to my soul, and even in this simple act of working on a puzzle, I find a profound sense of peace.*

*As I fill in another clue, my mind drifts to thoughts of our shared journey, the challenges we've faced and the love that binds us. I can't help but feel a swell of gratitude for this man who has become my anchor, my protector, and my partner in every sense.*

*I nuzzle closer, pressing a soft kiss to his chest before returning to the puzzle. The morning light filters through the curtains, casting a warm glow over us as we savor this quiet, stolen moment of tranquility.*

*For now, the outside world fades away, leaving only the comfort of our shared presence and the promise of a new day to facetogether.*
